contextual_notes: The user is in the early stages of considering accessible housing and values support and understanding.

general_insights: Providing empathetic and supportive responses can significantly enhance user satisfaction.
Encouraging users to take their time and offering ongoing support can lead to positive engagement.
Initial responses should aim to provide sufficient detail to address broad user queries effectively.
